title: Lassie come home
brief_description: You’ll find overwhelming drama and excitement in the dangerous journey undertaken by Lassie from Scotland to her young master’s home in Yorkshire. Roddy McDowell plays Joe, an endearing character, with Donald Crisp and Elsa Lancaster as his parents. Watch out for Elizabeth Taylor in her second movie appearance. Rated: G
